about_the_game:
Cooking has been revolutionized in the futuristic world of Neon Noodles. Inspired by the open-ended machine building puzzle games of Zachtronics such as Opus Magnum, you design and build your own fully automated kitchen robots to prepare meals instead of relying on manual labour. Guacamole, bibimbap, ramen, spaetzle, paella and many more recipes are waiting for you to be optimized in this open-ended puzzle game.

Features



  • Travel the world and master the art of cooking through technological advancement in a cyberpunk setting filled with mysteries.
  • Open-ended puzzles for endless replayability with 100+ recipes. Customise their process to be as simple, complicated or streamlined as you want and show your friends who the true chef is by sharing your optimized recipes.
  • Program kitchen robots through a very intuitive record and replay system where you control the robot that creates the program and edit later if needed. Use a combination of robots, ingredient stations, process stations and programming commands to create a well oiled machine out of over 200 ingredients that churns out dish after dish.

short_description: Neon Noodles is a cyberpunk kitchen automation game where you build and design robots to make food. It's an open-ended puzzle game in the genre of zach-likes where you travel the world and become a master chef of the local cuisine.
